title: The Ways
description: Book 3 of the Diary of the Displaced series.Alone again.Sitting on the ledge in the darkness of The Corridor.A sword thrust through his chest.His faithful companion, DogThing - thrown to the horde of Zombies below.The scaffold bridge that was his only escape - destroyed.Rudy, Adler, Reg and Marie - all separated by the closed portal.The portal key - stolen.His weapons - thrown into the darkness.Not one, but two dangerous enemies roaming in the darkness.Could it get much worse for James?Yes.It could.The Journal of James Halldon continues...
author: Glynn James
